passage_text: Buy Foreign Currency Cash in Perth. Avoid bank fees, get great rates and pay $0 commission¹ on your foreign currency exchange! We’re your one stop shop to buy foreign currency in Perth, contact us for up to date information for your holiday destination – or search here for your destination online.

What fees do you charge? FX Cash - 1% or minimum $AUD8.00 per currency. Travellers Cheques - 1% or minimum $AUD10.00. If you'd like to sell FX cash back to us, pop into one of our stores that will purchase it from you; Perth Palace (WA), Castlereagh St (NSW), Elizabeth St (VIC) and other selected WA stores. The currencies that these stores will buy back are listed below and on the Foreign Exchange page in the Bankwest PWS.

latest rates. Below are the rates offered as at 15 Oct 2015 10:44 PM AEDST. These rates are subject to change and should therefore be considered indicative only. The rates used to calculate your order are finalised once you have confirmed it, and payment must be received within 24 hours.

If you have any leftover foreign cash and you wish to sell it back to us, pop into our Bankwest Place store (WA) or other select WA stores. Bankwest Place foreign currency trading hours are: 9:30am – 12:00pm (Monday – Friday). 1:00pm – 4:30pm (Monday – Friday). 1  view exchange rates of currencies we accept.
